title: Lag In Teamfight
body:
When im in a league game and theree is a teamfight when everyone has full builds my fps drops to 30 fps when usually it was 60. But these weeeks on average i get 60 when usually i receive about 100-200 fps... Why is there a sudden decrease in my fps?. These are my specs 

AMD FX(tm)-8350, x64 based processor 4.00 ghz 8 core processor
8 Gig ram
NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 3G

On league i run on high graphics and shadows off.
On league i do low spec enabling and also the other client closed in game.... SO whats making my frames drop.... I used to have the same graphic settings and had 200 fps but now its at like 30

replies.body: Your game files could be having trouble rendering during these big fights.  See if a force repatch can help with our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Otherwise, use our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide which can help tune things up a bit.  Let me know if that helps you out.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nB9ULMwQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-18T23:28:22.131+0000)
>
> Your game files could be having trouble rendering during these big fights.  See if a force repatch can help with our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Otherwise, use our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide which can help tune things up a bit.  Let me know if that helps you out.

I attempted to force repatch but it kept saying cancelled and it stopped working
Hey there, you may have security settings causing a block.  What happens if you select Run As Administrator?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nB9ULMwQ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-21T16:53:41.631+0000)
>
> Hey there, you may have security settings causing a block.  What happens if you select Run As Administrator?

The hextech tool is defaulted to be run out of administrator
